field.name: ma_sp
field.check: ma_sp not in (select ma_vt from vdmsp)

field.name: ma_bp
field.check: ma_bp <> '' and ma_bp not in (select ma_bp from dmbp)

field.name: ma_vt
field.check: ma_vt not in (select ma_vt from dmvt)

field.check: ngay_hl_tu is not null and ngay_hl_den is not null and ngay_hl_tu > ngay_hl_den

declare @q nvarchar(4000), @field varchar(32), @wsID varchar(1), @datetime0 datetime declare @user int, @admin bit, @r int, @i int, @k int, @count int, @voucherID varchar(8)
select @wsID = rtrim(val) from options where rtrim(name) = 'm_ws_id' select @i = 1, @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @voucherID = 'DM1', @datetime0 = getdate()
-- Update update @@table set dvt_sp = b.dvt from @@table a join dmvt b on a.ma_sp = b.ma_vt where a.dvt_sp = '' update @@table set dvt = b.dvt from @@table a join dmvt b on a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt where a.dvt = ''
-- Check &Checking;
if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'dvt_sp', stt, '00001' from @@table a left join vdmvtqddvt b on a.dvt_sp = b.dvt and (a.ma_sp = b.ma_vt or b.ma_vt = '*') left join dmvt c on a.ma_sp = c.ma_vt and a.dvt_sp = c.dvt where b.dvt is null and c.dvt is null &w1;'dvt_sp'&w2;stt&w3;'00001'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @field = 'dvt_sp', @r = min(stt) from @@table a left join vdmvtqddvt b on a.dvt_sp = b.dvt and (a.ma_sp = b.ma_vt or b.ma_vt = '*') left join dmvt c on a.ma_sp = c.ma_vt and a.dvt_sp = c.dvt where b.dvt is null and c.dvt is null&Error; end
if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'dvt', stt, '00001' from @@table a left join vdmvtqddvt b on a.dvt = b.dvt and (a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt or b.ma_vt = '*') left join dmvt c on a.ma_vt = c.ma_vt and a.dvt = c.dvt where b.dvt is null and c.dvt is null &w1;'dvt'&w2;stt&w3;'00001'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @field = 'dvt', @r = min(stt) from @@table a left join vdmvtqddvt b on a.dvt = b.dvt and (a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt or b.ma_vt = '*') left join dmvt c on a.ma_vt = c.ma_vt and a.dvt = c.dvt where b.dvt is null and c.dvt is null&Error; end
&EndErrorMode;
if @admin <> 1 begin if @type = '1' begin if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@admin, @user, 'BMTran', 'Edit') = 0 select @type = '0' end end
if @type = '0' delete @@table from @@table a where exists(select 1 from phdm b where a.ma_sp = b.ma_sp) select a.* into #k from @@table a join phdm b on a.ma_sp = b.ma_sp delete @@table from @@table a where exists(select 1 from #k b where a.ma_sp = b.ma_sp)
select top 0 a.stt_rec, a.stt_rec0, a.line_nbr, a.ma_vt, a.dvt, b.nhieu_dvt, a.he_so, a.so_luong, a.tl_hh, a.ngay_ct1, a.ngay_ct2, a.tg_th, a.tl_pb, a.dien_giai into #d1 from ctdm a, dmvt b
select @count = count(*) from @@table
if @count > 0 begin select top 0 stt_rec, ma_sp, cast(0 as int) as stt, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #id1 from phdm insert into #id1(stt_rec, ma_sp, stt) select '', ma_sp, min(stt) from @@table group by ma_sp
select @k = count(*) from #id1 exec AI_ERP$App$UpdateIdentityNumber @wsID, @voucherID, @k, @@userID, '#id1'
insert into #d1 select b.stt_rec, replace(str((a.stt - b.stt) + 1, 3), ' ', '0'), (a.stt - b.stt) + 1, a.ma_vt, a.dvt, c.nhieu_dvt, 1, a.so_luong, a.tl_hh, a.ngay_hl_tu, a.ngay_hl_den, a.tg_th, a.tl_pb, a.dien_giai from @@table a join #id1 b on a.ma_sp = b.ma_sp left join dmvt c on a.ma_vt = c.ma_vt order by a.ma_sp, a.stt
update #d1 set he_so = b.he_so from #d1 a join vdmvtqddvt b on (a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt or b.ma_vt = '*') and a.dvt = b.dvt where a.nhieu_dvt = 1
select top 0 a.stt_rec, a.ma_sp, a.dvt as dvt_sp, b.nhieu_dvt, a.he_so, a.ma_bp, a.t_so_luong into #m1 from phdm a, dmvt b insert into #m1 select b.stt_rec, a.ma_sp, a.dvt_sp, c.nhieu_dvt, 1, a.ma_bp, 0 from @@table a join #id1 b on a.stt = b.stt join dmvt c on a.ma_sp = c.ma_vt
update #m1 set t_so_luong = b.t_so_luong from #m1 a join (select stt_rec, sum(so_luong) as t_so_luong from #d1 group by stt_rec) b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec update #m1 set he_so = b.he_so from #m1 a join vdmvtqddvt b on (a.ma_sp = b.ma_vt or b.ma_vt = '*') and a.dvt_sp = b.dvt where a.nhieu_dvt = 1
select top 0 stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_dvcs, c$, m$, d$, ma_sp, cast(0 as int) as stt, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #i1 from idm insert into #i1 select a.stt_rec, null, '', '', rtrim(a.ma_sp) + a.stt_rec, '#10$' + rtrim(a.ma_sp) + '#20$' + rtrim(b.ma_bp), '', a.ma_sp, a.stt from #id1 a join @@table b on a.stt = b.stt select @q = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Update$Inquiry('#i1', '#d1', 'd$', 'ma_vt', '#10$', 'stt_rec', default, default, default, default, default) exec sp_executesql @q
-- Insert @@inserting(master); @@inserting(detail); @@inserting(inquiry); end
if @type = '1' begin select @k = count(*) from #k
if @k > 0 begin select top 0 stt_rec, ma_sp, cast(0 as int) as stt, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #id2 from phdm insert into #id2 select b.stt_rec, a.ma_sp, min(a.stt) from #k a join phdm b on a.ma_sp = b.ma_sp group by a.ma_sp, b.stt_rec
select top 0 a.stt_rec, a.stt_rec0, a.line_nbr, a.ma_vt, a.dvt, b.nhieu_dvt, a.he_so, a.so_luong, a.tl_hh, a.ngay_ct1, a.ngay_ct2, a.tg_th, a.tl_pb, a.dien_giai into #d2 from ctdm a, dmvt b insert into #d2 select b.stt_rec, replace(str((a.stt - b.stt) + 1, 3), ' ', '0'), (a.stt - b.stt) + 1, a.ma_vt, a.dvt, c.nhieu_dvt, 1, a.so_luong, a.tl_hh, a.ngay_hl_tu, a.ngay_hl_den, a.tg_th, a.tl_pb, a.dien_giai from #k a join #id2 b on a.ma_sp = b.ma_sp left join dmvt c on a.ma_vt = c.ma_vt order by a.ma_sp, a.stt
update #d2 set he_so = b.he_so from #d2 a join vdmvtqddvt b on (a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt or b.ma_vt = '*') and a.dvt = b.dvt where a.nhieu_dvt = 1
select top 0 a.stt_rec, a.ma_sp, a.dvt as dvt_sp, b.nhieu_dvt, a.he_so, a.ma_bp, a.t_so_luong into #m2 from phdm a, dmvt b insert into #m2 select b.stt_rec, a.ma_sp, a.dvt_sp, c.nhieu_dvt, 1, a.ma_bp, 0 from #k a join #id2 b on a.stt = b.stt join dmvt c on a.ma_sp = c.ma_vt
update #m2 set t_so_luong = b.t_so_luong from #m2 a join (select stt_rec, sum(so_luong) as t_so_luong from #d2 group by stt_rec) b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec update #m2 set he_so = b.he_so from #m2 a join vdmvtqddvt b on (a.ma_sp = b.ma_vt or b.ma_vt = '*') and a.dvt_sp = b.dvt where a.nhieu_dvt = 1
select top 0 stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_dvcs, c$, m$, d$, ma_sp, cast(0 as int) as stt, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #i2 from idm insert into #i2 select a.stt_rec, null, '', '', rtrim(a.ma_sp) + a.stt_rec, '#10$' + rtrim(a.ma_sp) + '#20$' + rtrim(b.ma_bp), '', a.ma_sp, a.stt from #id2 a join #k b on a.stt = b.stt select @q = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Update$Inquiry('#i2', '#d2', 'd$', 'ma_vt', '#10$', 'stt_rec', default, default, default, default, default) exec sp_executesql @q
-- Update update phdm set @@list(master); from phdm a join #m2 b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec
delete ctdm where stt_rec in (select distinct stt_rec from #id2)
truncate table #d1 insert into #d1 select * from #d2 @@inserting(detail);
update idm set @@list(inquiry); from idm a join #i2 b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec end end
